property.name: background
property.return: the border color of the bean
property.description: Sets or gets the background color of the Bean.
property.summary: Sets or gets the background color of the Bean.

property.name: beanViewerExportFormats
property.return: the file save/export formats of the viewer
property.description: Gets or gets the file save/export formats of the Bean's viewer.
property.summary: Gets or gets the file save/export formats of the Bean's viewer.

property.name: border
property.description: Sets or gets the border type, width and color.
property.summary: Sets or gets the border type, width and color.

property.name: displayMode
property.return: the display mode of the viewer
property.description: Sets or gets the display mode of the viewer in the Bean.
property.summary: Sets or gets the display mode of the viewer in the Bean.

property.name: font
property.return: the font type used in the viewer
property.description: Sets or gets the font type of the Bean's viewer.
property.summary: Sets or gets the font type of the Bean's viewer.

property.name: foreground
property.description: Sets or gets the foreground color.
property.summary: Sets or gets the foreground color.

property.name: name
property.description: Gets or sets the name of the Bean.
property.summary: Gets or sets the name of the Bean.

property.name: relativeExtraDirectories
property.return: the relative path or paths to the client set extra directory/directories
property.description:
Get or set the relative path or comma separated paths to the extra resource directories of the Servoy JasperReports plugin. The paths are set per client and are relative to the server corresponding directories setting.
Please refer to the same property of the Servoy JasperReports plugin for more details.
property.summary: Get or set the relative path or comma separated paths to the extra resource directories of the Servoy JasperReports plugin.

property.name: relativeReportsDirectory
property.return: the location of the client set reports directory, relative to the server set path
property.description:
Property for retrieving and setting the path to the reports directory, set by the current client, relative to the server reports directory of the Servoy JasperReports plugin.
Please refer to the same property of the Servoy JasperReports plugin for more details.
property.summary: Property for retrieving and setting the path to the reports directory, set by the current client, relative to the server reports directory of the Servoy JasperReports plugin.

function.name: getHeight
function.description: Gets the height of the Bean.
function.summary: Gets the height of the Bean.

function.name: getLocationX
function.return: the x-coordinate of the Bean's top-left corner location
function.description: Gets the x-coordinate of the Bean's top-left corner location.
function.summary: Gets the x-coordinate of the Bean's top-left corner location.

function.name: getLocationY
function.return: the y-coordinate of the Bean's top-left corner location
function.description: Gets the y-coordinate of the Bean's top-left corner location.
function.summary: Gets the y-coordinate of the Bean's top-left corner location.

function.name: getWidth
function.description: Gets the width of the Bean.
function.summary: Gets the width of the Bean.

function.name: setSize
function.description: Sets the size of the Bean.
function.summary: Sets the size of the Bean.

function.name: showReport
function.description: Shows the indicated report in a JasperReports Viewer (in the Bean).
function.summary: Shows the indicated report in a JasperReports Viewer (in the Bean).

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: the datasource (the server name or foundset) to run the report on

parameter.name: report
parameter.description: the report file to export and preview (relative to the reports directory)

parameter.name: parameters
parameter.description: the map of parameters to be used when previewing the report

function.name: showReport
function.description: Shows the indicated report in a JasperReports Viewer (in the Bean).
function.summary: Shows the indicated report in a JasperReports Viewer (in the Bean).

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: the datasource (the server name or foundset) to run the report on

parameter.name: report
parameter.description: the report file to export and preview (relative to the reports directory)

parameter.name: parameters
parameter.description: the map of parameters to be used when previewing the report

parameter.name: localeString
parameter.description: the string which specifies the locale

function.name: showReport
function.description: Shows the indicated report in a JasperReports Viewer (in the Bean).
function.summary: Shows the indicated report in a JasperReports Viewer (in the Bean).

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: the datasource (the server name or foundset) to run the report on

parameter.name: report
parameter.description: the report file to export and preview (relative to the reports directory)

parameter.name: parameters
parameter.description: the map of parameters to be used when previewing the report

parameter.name: localeString
parameter.description: the string which specifies the locale

parameter.name: moveTableOfContent
parameter.description: true in order to move the table of contents, false otherwise
